artist: Artist: Stephen Dupont; Publisher: Stephen Dupont
creditline: Gift of funds from the Ronald Kinney Foundation
description: accordion-folded book with cardboard covers and pages; 77 pages with photos of people dressed in costumes and face paint for a New Guinea festival; block printed cover designs (black front cover) and frontispieces (brown); block printed cloth-covered slipcover
inscription:
Title, Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed
medium: Gelatin silver prints, linocuts, and woodcuts; accordion-folded volume
provenance: The artist; [Booklyn Artists Alliance, New York]; sold to MIA, 2007.
signed: on second title page, in black ink: [ SING-SING-Mt. Hagen, Papua New Guinea/ 2004/ Stephen Dupont/ Artist Proof. August 24, 2006 Bondi Beach]
title: Sing-Sing 2004
